infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Kaiba uses your calendar to display and sync events, helping you track your schedule and receive reminders.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Kaiba needs full access to your calendar so you can create, edit, and manage events directly from the app.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Kaiba uses reminders to notify you about upcoming birthdays, events, and important dates you've scheduled in the app.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: Kaiba needs full reminders access to create and manage task lists associated with your events and schedules.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Kaiba needs access to your photo library so you can have a profile picture in the app
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Kaiba needs permission to save images to your photo library when you download pictures from events or save shared content.

plugins.calendarPermission: Kaiba needs access to your calendar to sync events and set reminders.
